response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Considering its worth and the unique features it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. We understand that this investment might be substantial, but we are confident that it will provide you with immense returns. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 12000}
